In a message dated 7/7/00 2:10:12 AM Pacific Daylight Time, KSLawdogg writes:

<< 
 Kluster, well, Kluster thinks most of the Maximals on Past Earth are a bunch 
of incompitent fools and to him, they're proving his theory. >>

I meant Chordate.  I swear, I keep correcting myself ont his, catching myself 
doing this.  Chordate, not Kluster.  Chordate.  I don't know why I'm getting 
those mixed up.  Maybe 'cause Kluster sounds much better.
